ProcessTemplates.Name: Upload files from local fileshare to Azure Data Lake
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process uploads files from the local fileshare into Azure Data Lake. By default, if files with the same names already exist in Azure, they are overwritten.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"TargetContainer":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of the container in which files will be uploaded."},"AzureConnectionString":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The connection string for the Azure Storage Account."},"SourcePath":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The path of the source folder in the local fileshare."},"TargetPath":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The path of the target folder in the container. If the folder doesn't exist, it will be created."},"SourceFilePattern":{"Value":"\"\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The pattern that specifies which files from the given source path will be uploaded."}}

Process.Name: Upload files from local fileshare to Azure Data Lake
Process.Description: This template process uploads files from the local fileshare into Azure Data Lake. By default, if files with the same names already exist in Azure, they are overwritten.
